actions.description: Malaxxix makes two Forge Hammer or Whip attacks in any combination.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60/180 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the end of Malaxxix's next turn. Hit or Miss: The hammer then magically returns to Malaxxix's hand.
actions.name: Forge Hammer

actions.description: 12 to hit, reach 30 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) slashing damage, and the target has the restrained condition for 1 minute. The restrained target can make a DC 20 Strength saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Only one creature can be restrained by the whip at a time.
actions.name: Whip

actions.description: Malaxxix summons a vortex of whirling mezzoloths at a point it can see within 90 feet of itself. The vortex is a 30-foot-radius, 100-foot-high cylinder centered on that point. Each creature other than Malaxxix in that area must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 35 (10d6) force damage and has the restrained condition while within the cylinder. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is pushed to the nearest unoccupied space outside the cylinder. The vortex lasts until the start of Malaxxix's next turn.
actions.name: Mezzoloth Vortex (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description: Malaxxix moves up to its speed. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks. When Malaxxix moves within 5 feet of a creature during this movement, that creature takes 5 (1d10) lightning damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.
actions.name: Fiendish Stride

actions.description: Malaxxix makes one Forge Hammer or Whip attack.
actions.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)

name: Malaxxix [BMT]
resistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: If Malaxxix fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: Malaxxix has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance
